message: My partner and I are at LAUNCH, we have a little startup we're secretly working on and looking for a great UI designer. Let's connect.
If you find one tell me so I can steal them.
im not at launch, but happy to talk.
LoL. I've found a lot of developers and VCs.
I agree about the VCs/angels, but it seems like everyone I meet is a founder looking for a tech cofounder/devel.
@BullyPromos Interesting. They must be just random people with ideas but no chops. :-/
Hi there, I'm actually a UI developer.  I just designed a new interface for EnterMedia Software.  Drop me a line and I'll show you some good looking design.
